signals.reason: Bullish momentum: EMA9 is above EMA21, MACD shows recent bullish crossover, price broke recent highs forming a bullish engulfing candle, RSI around 58 indicating strength, Stochastic high but not overbought, Bollinger Bands suggest price near upper band but still rising.
